meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds with a characteristic odor.
meanings.sent1: The ionones are known for their distinct smell.
meanings.sent2: I could smell the ionones from the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The ionones in the perfume made everyone sneeze at the party.
meanings.sent4: The ionones wafted through the air like a sweet cloud.
meanings.sent5: Her memory was triggered by the familiar scent of ionones.

meanings.definition: Any of various isomeric compounds with the formula C13H18O.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the structure of ionones with the formula C13H18O.
meanings.sent2: The lab results confirmed the presence of ionones in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The ionones with the formula C13H18O reacted unexpectedly in the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The mystery of the missing compound was solved when they identified the ionones.
meanings.sent5: The unique properties of ionones with the formula C13H18O fascinated the researchers.
